dataList.content: She has Effloresced an E.G.O of her own afore our paths crossed...
M-Mister Rien said manifesting E.G.O isn't something just anyone can do.
He said h-he's jealous of me. H-having such an unshakable conviction about what's good and evil is nothing short of amazing, he said...
H-hearing that, I couldn't help thinking—e-even if the day the whole family's been waiting for comes, even when my big sis Y-Yoshihide finally comes home...
M-maybe, just maybe... they'll make an exception and let me stay.
So p-put in a good word for me with Mister Rien, please? T-tell him I've always done my best.
